description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Toàn thời gian, Chính thức
              
              Tháng 07 2018
              
              A
              

              1.	Make and follow status of business contract
              
              2.	Manage revenue works: issue invoice, etc, update output data of inventory of revenue
              
              3.	Make daily/weekly report on each project/ contracts as required from customers
              
              4.	Support on making annual business plan
              
              5.	Interpreter/Translate meeting, material as required from customers/managers
              
              6.	Other requirement from managers
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              REQUIREMENTS
              
              1.	Good understanding of the different types of contracts
              
              2.	Bachelor Degree (Finance/Banking/Economics Major)
              
              3.	Part qualified accountant
              
              4.	Basic understanding of business management
              
              5.	Good basic understanding of IT field
              
              6.	MOS, especially Excel skill, making report on .ppt
              
              7.	Time management
              
              8.	Administration skills (diary systems, filing systems, arrange meetings, produce minutes/agenda…)
              
              9.	Analytical and problem-solving ability
              
              10.	English: Business fluent
              
              11.	Good interpersonal skill
              

              BENEFITS
              
              1.	Salary negotiable
              
              2.	SHUI Insurance according to Labor Law
              
              3.	PTI Insurance Package for Employee
              
              4.	Birthday, Tet, Mid- autumn festival… gift
              
              5.	Teambuilding
              
              6.	Abroad training for excellent employee
              
              7.	Annual health check at international hospital
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                Mức lương và phúc lợi cạnh tranh
